posts.post_title: WTB T206 Sweet Cap 150 overprint HOFer SGC 40-50
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Hello all,
I am looking for a Sweet Cap 150 overprint HOFer graded SGC 40 or 50.  I would prefer to pay with Paypal.  Anyone looking to sell one?  I also have a PSA 5 Blue Chase P350 for trade coming in that I accidentaly bought.  You can send scans and prices to:

Thanks,
Bob
